Watch the 42-Minute “Rap Monument” With Pusha T, Young Thug, Action Bronson, Danny Brown, and More

posted by Confusion on December 18, 2014 in Audio

We’ve heard some of the pieces from Noisey’s “Rap Monument” posse cut, and now we get the full thing, a 42-minute song featuring production by Hudson Mohawke.

Featuring, in order of appearance:

Pusha T
Bryant Dope
Go Dreamer
Retch
Nipsey Hussle
Problem
Danny Brown
Mayhem Lauren
Raekwon da Chef
Vado
Kilo Kish
Flatbush Zombies
Renegade El Rey
Rockie Fresh
Pill
Bodega Bamz
Remy Banks
Killer Mike
Del Harris
YG
CyHi da Prince
Young Thug
Aston Matthews
Prodigy
SL Jones
Nigel Nasty
Bobby Creekwater
Action Bronson
Heems
Mike G
Yak Ballz
Zebra Katz
Two-9
Alexander Spit
Scotty/ATL
Da$h

Tags:  Action Bronson, Danny Brown, Hudson Mohawke, pusha t, young thug
